media:group.media:title: September 2022 Engineering Design System Forum
media:group.media:description:
The Engineering Design System forum is a quarterly event where engineers that build and support design systems can get together and share experiences. The September forum was focused on setting up and maintaining repositories to provide top-notch developer experiences.  Speakers represented Target Corp (Emi Lyman), Netflix (Ben Duran), and Nrwl (Juri Strumpflohner)

05:06 - Welcome & Forum Context
6:28 - Emi Lyman, Evolving Target's Design System Testing Suite
22:20 - Den Duran, Migrating off of Yarn 
44:22 - Juri Strumpflohner, High Speed Monorepos with high-quality DX
